summary: Anthropic has updated its terms of service to block access to its Claude AI models for any company that’s majority-owned or controlled by Chinese entities.

title: Ryzen to the top: How AMD innovated in the gaming CPU market
summary: AMD holds the gaming performance crown for desktop CPUs. It wasn't always like that, and a dive into the history of how the current status quo came to be is wrought with a hard-fought battle between two titans.

title: Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 gaming laptop is $300 off at Best Buy — RTX 5070 Ti, 32GB RAM, and 240Hz OLED screen can be yours for $1,600
summary: The RTX 5070 Ti is a big step up over the 8GB RTX 5070 when it comes to gaming laptops, but it's often an even bigger jump in price. Thankfully, Acer has your back with its Predator Helios Neo 16S AI that's on sale for just $1,599 right now at Best Buy.

title: Synopsys adds generative AI for chip development with Synopsys.ai Copilot design software
summary: Having designed an AI-enhanced EDA toolset, Synopsys now adds Assistive and Creative capabilities for chip designers that can accelerate chip design across all phases.

title: Expansion card lets you insert 512GB of extra DDR5 memory into your PCIe slot — CXL 2.0 AIC designed for TRX50 and W790 workstation motherboards
summary: Gigabyte launches the AI Top CXL R5X4 add-in-card to expand the amount of memory on the brand's TRX50 AI Top and W790 AI Top motherboards.

title: Anker brings beastly 14-port dock, plus new compact chargers and portable batteries to IFA
summary: Anker's latest devices at IFA 2025 include a 14-port dock with a display, a fast-charging battery pack with a display, and a display, and a compact 160W charger with a… you know.

summary: England defender Lucy Bronze sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about winning the Euros and life outside of football.

title: 'People looked at me like I was a something, not someone'

title: 'He fixes what needs fixing' - why Raducanu turned to Nadal's ex-coach

summary: BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.
